line.text: Who is it that says most which can say more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than this rich praise that you alone are you
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In whose confine immured is the store
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which should example where your equal grew
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lean penury within that pen doth dwell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That to his subject lends not some small glory
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But he that writes of you if he can tell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That you are you so dignifies his story
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Let him but copy what in you is writ
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Not making worse what nature made so clear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And such a counterpart shall fame his wit
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Making his style admired every where
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: You to your beauteous blessings add a curse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Being fond on praise which makes your praises worse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
